reviews.review: Valorant? Nah. The og csgo? Makes my knees weak.
gówno jebane jebac tego cs kurwa opierdalają konta po 2tys i chuja z tego robią jebac ich
Игра просто супер правда обновление не очень послдении но норм.
my favorite game ever the community is funny and cool so i love this game

This game made me realize what teamwork really means.Great FPS where the more you play the more you get better finding new strats and plays and making every round unique and the game replayable.Lets not forget  this game is a classic and after 9 years its still alive.
Trüs bon jeux et en plus addictif.
zajebista tak wciagająca ze rozjebałem biurko

Well after many hours in the game,
Have to say that the game is fun but gives you Mental illnesses.

Античит пашет с горем пополам система рангов сломана уже не первый год если хотите без пользы потерять время всем советую,
Me crucé con un tipo que tenia el nombre en letras árabes y foto de perfil de una rata, me recagó a tiros y después me comentó el perfil, bienvenidos a cs go
es muy buen juego lo recomiendo mucho

this game is quite the eloquent gaming expirence if i do say so my self all though is does get me rather mad at times most evenings i sit and enjoy a nice dark roast brewed coffee and relax and play some counter strike all though the ak needs a nerf game is very entertaining and amusing

Att. Dilma
Eh, I played a match or two, it's worth a try.
игра норм. но в игре есть хохлы.
Игра в целом не плохая, играю в неё уже на протяжение 3 лет, но есть -, зачем было делать её бесплатной, а после делать Прайм за 1к, в итоге игра раньше стоила не больше 500 а теперь 1к

I would definitely recommend it. It's the one game on steam I can continually go back to, and it's the only game I regularly play anymore.

One of the main reasons I enjoy it is because you can really see how much you improve over time. My aim and game sense are always improving, and there's always more to learn.

I also enjoy watching the professional players.
